sentences.en: Gamma Knife surgery ( GKS ) has recently been tried as an alternative to surgical extirpation.
sentences.cn: 伽玛刀治疗 ( GKS ) 最近被尝试作为手术根治之外的另一种选择.

sentences.en: Gamma Knife surgery has recently been tried as an alternative to surgical extirpation.
sentences.cn: 伽玛刀治疗最近被尝试作为手术根治之外的另一种选择。

sentences.en: Objective : To explore an operative method for the extirpation of hysteromyoma with laparoscope.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨腹腔镜子宫肌瘤摘除术的方法.
